alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 11:29PM EDT until June 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Somerset County in southeastern Maryland... Central Accomack County in southeastern Virginia... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1129 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tylerton to near Lawsonia to 6 miles northwest of Onancock, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lawsonia around 1140 PM EDT. Parksley around 1145 PM EDT. Marion Station around 1150 PM EDT. Westover around 1200 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hallwood, Harborton, Mappsville, Oriole, Byrdtown, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Smith Island, Hopewell and Rehobeth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
